channel.title: Cache

item.title: Cache
item.dc:creator: @I96 I96
item.description:
@I96 wrote:

Ok well I just recently got a cache hosting site so i changed the download link in CacheDownloader.java and Client.java so i compiled no errors… but when i try to run the client it downloads the cache but it gets stuck on “Unpacking…”. How can I fix this?

Also I made a run.jar instead of .bat and I was going to try and make it so all the players needed to download was that but when it downloads the cache, it downloads it to the desktop, how can i change this so it downloads it to the C drive?

public static String sencondDir() { File file = new File("C:/Cache/"); if (!file.exists()) file.mkdir(); return file.toString(); }
That is in signlink.java, so i thought it should download it to the c drive? PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic
